item.title: Shutdown silver lining? Your IPO review comes after investors buy in
item.description: With 90% of SEC staff furloughed, the agency announced on Thursday that it won't penalize companies for omitting pricing details during the shutdown.

item.title: While OpenAI races to build AI data centers, Nadella reminds us that Microsoft already has them
item.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella offered a glimpse of the "first of many" massive Nvidia AI systems it is rolling out, starting now.

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz denies report of India office, calls it ‘fake news’
item.description: a16z’s Anish Acharya calls India office reports “entirely fake news!”

item.title: Reflection AI raises $2B to be America’s open frontier AI lab, challenging DeepSeek
